data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Alerrandro.
Goal! Fluminense go level at 1-1 through Nene in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 2, That's a fine assist from Evanilson.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Bragantino's Morato gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
Alerrandro of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Braganca Paulista Fluminense drive forward through Evanilson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 10, Fluminense needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Fluminense.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
Artur for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 17, In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nene of Fluminense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Bragantino throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Nabizao.
In the minute 21, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Alerrandro (Bragantino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Bragantino.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Fluminense at Nabizao.
Nene (Fluminense) has received a yellow card from Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Braganca Paulista.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Bragantino's area.
In the minute 33, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Edimar.
In the minute 35, Edimar is back on the pitch.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 37, Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, The match at Nabizao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nene, who is down injured.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Fluminense!
Nene returns to the field for Fluminense after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 43, Artur (Bragantino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Michel Araujo's header is off-target for Fluminense.
In the minute 44, Bragantino have a goal kick.
Fluminenseâ€™s Michel Araujo is on his feet again at Nabizao.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Fluminense.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Fluminense's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 45, Claudinho for Bragantino drives towards goal at Nabizao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
The first-half has ended.
Michel Araujo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 46, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima has blown to start the second-half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
The away team replace Marcos Paulo with Luiz Henrique.
In the minute 47, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In Braganca Paulista, Yuri Lima of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Fluminense are coming forward and Yuri Lima gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 49, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick Fluminense.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 52, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matheus Jesus is booked for the home team.
Bragantino's Alerrandro gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 55, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Nabizao.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
The home team have replaced Morato with Luis Phelipe. This is the first substitution made today by Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 58, Fluminense's Yuri Lima has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 60, Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
In the minute 61, Bragantino needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 62, Evanilson (Fluminense) gets a yellow card.
In Braganca Paulista Bragantino attack through Claudinho. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Fluminense at Nabizao.
Ganso is replacing Nene for the away team.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Igor Juliao (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino's Matheus Jesus has run offside.
Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao (Bragantino) is making a second substitution, with Lucas Evangelista replacing Barreto.
In the minute 69, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
At Nabizao, Luis Phelipe has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
Michel Araujo is back on his feet again.
In the minute 71, Play has been interrupted briefly in Braganca Paulista to check on Michel Araujo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 72, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Fluminense's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 76, Edimar for Bragantino has been booked by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima and receives a first yellow card.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 80, Bragantino's Claudinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Bragantino make their third substitution with Robinho replacing Artur.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Bragantino.
Bruno Tubarao is on a sub for Claudinho for Bragantino.
In the minute 82, Weverson is replacing Matheus Jesus for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Luis Phelipe puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 83, Great play from Bruno Tubarao to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Fluminense.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 86, Fluminense's Ganso has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's third substitution at Nabizao with Fernando Pacheco replacing Dodi.
Bragantino drive forward but Alerrandro is judged offside.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Egidio (Fluminense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fluminense's Igor Juliao is on target but unsuccessful.
The fourth official's board shows 10 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
11 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Caio Paulista is replacing Michel Araujo for Fluminense at Nabizao.
Lucas Evangelista (Bragantino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
